# Financial Report

## Introduction

This report provides a detailed financial analysis of our company's branches across different regions.

## Financial Data

```{r}
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

# Load data
df <- read.csv('financial_data.csv')

kable(head(df), format = "pipe")
```

## Balance Sheet

```{r}
balance_sheet <- df %>%
  group_by(Branch, Year) %>%
  summarise(
    Total_Assets = sum(Assets),
    Total_Liabilities = sum(Liabilities),
    Total_Equity = sum(Equity)
  )

kable(balance_sheet, format = "pipe")
```

## Income Statement

```{r}
income_statement <- df %>%
  group_by(Branch, Year) %>%
  summarise(
    Total_Income = sum(Income),
    Total_Expenses = sum(Expenses),
    Net_Income = sum(Income) - sum(Expenses)
  )

kable(income_statement, format = "pipe")
```

## Cash Flow Statement

```{r}
cash_flow_statement <- df %>%
  group_by(Branch, Year) %>%
  summarise(
    Total_CashFlow = sum(CashFlow)
  )

kable(cash_flow_statement, format = "pipe")
```
